sense.name: provide a signal, symptom, evidence, or argument for an existence or truth
sense.examples: These symptoms indicate a serious illness. The cooling waters indicate the coming of winter. The barometer indicated storm. The results indicate the need for more work.

sense.name: point at something or someone
sense.examples: He indicated the opponents to the newcomer. He indicated the right road by nodding towards it. The sign indicates north. I indicated the children's clothing section to the customer.

sense.name: express feeling or intention
sense.examples: He indicated his wishes in a letter. Indicating her approval with a nod, she walked out of the conference room. The journal indicates her distate for hunting.

sense.name: suggest or prescribe a solution
sense.examples: Antihistamine is indicated as a treatment for allergies. I think a long cool drink is indicated! In a case like this, a firm approach is indicated.
